detectors.description:
Ownable.transferOwnership(address) () should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner ()
detectors.markdown:
[Ownable.transferOwnership(address)]() should emit an event for: 
	- [owner = newOwner]()

detectors.description:
SmartPoolToken.changeRate(uint256) () should emit an event for: 
	- _rate = newRate ()
detectors.markdown:
[SmartPoolToken.changeRate(uint256)]() should emit an event for: 
	- [_rate = newRate]()

detectors.description:
SmartPoolToken.SmartPoolToken(uint256,address).wallet () lacks a zero-check on :
		- beneficial = wallet ()

Deprecated standard detected THROW ():
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
detectors.markdown:
Deprecated standard detected [THROW]():
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

detectors.description: Variable SmartPoolToken.ETHER () is not in mixedCase
